# MarshalStreamReadStringResult.IsEndOfStream property

Indicates whether or not the end of the stream was reached while reading from the stream.

```csharp
public bool IsEndOfStream { get; }
```

## Remarks

The value of `EndedDueToNullTerminator` will always be false if this is true.
